item.description:
Dreidle, Dreidle, Dreidle
I made it out of clay
and when it's dry and ready,
Oh dreidle I shall Play!!!


Come out and celebrate Chanukah. Join some of your friends and members on the New Haven Green for the lighting of the Menorah! There will be song, dancing and refreshments!

Dreidle, Dreidle, Dreidle
I made it out of clay
and when it's dry and ready,
Oh dreidle I shall Play!!!


The lighting begins at 4:00. I will be in somewhere near the Menorah at 3:30. Looking forward to seeing so many of you there!

contact:
Robyn-Allise
203-823-5302
item.name: Happy Chanukah!!! Menorah Lighting on th NH Green!!
